content:
User: Session 2: You start a new chat and say, “How’s the app coming?” I’d need a hint (e.g., “You mean the app from last time that was 50% done?”) to jump back in.

Grok: How to Make It Work
Drop a Recap: Starting with a quick summary (e.g., “Last chat, we covered Z—now what’s next?”) helps me lock in fast.
